argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | qlift.1 | |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. [ x ] R , A >. ) |
| 2 |  | qlift.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. Y ) |
| 3 |  | qlift.3 | |- ( ph -> R Er X ) |
| 4 |  | qlift.4 | |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | qliftfun.4 | |- ( x = y -> A = B ) |
| 6 |  | qliftfund.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ x R y ) -> A = B ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( x R y -> A = B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_alrimivv | |- ( ph -> A. x A. y ( x R y -> A = B ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_qliftfun | |- ( ph -> ( Fun F <-> A. x A. y ( x R y -> A = B ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> Fun F ) |
